title: Dead On Arrival
description: Librarian note: alternative-cover edition of B007NYKEMU."Unstoppable, fast-paced, zombie action with a twist of originality that sets this series apart from the horde."'Southern California is zombie central, stay out if you want to live!' The message could not have been clearer. But after three long years searching for his daughter, Chris Collins is not about to give up now.Fighting his way through the streets of post-apocalyptic Los Angeles, Chris will encounter an old friend who is now an enemy, a three-year-old with incredible telekinetic powers, warring street gangs and shoot-on-sight corporation soldiers. Not to mention the zombies - thousands upon thousands of zombies.As the action hurtles towards its conclusion Chris will find himself up against the madman holding his daughter captive, the psychopath who may have started the whole epidemic and who now plans to conquer the world at the head of a zombie army.Will Chris get to Ruby in time? And if he does, can he save her from what she's become?
author: J.J. Zep
